net.jawr.web.resource
Class FileSystemResourceHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.AbstractResourceHandler
      net.jawr.web.resource.FileSystemResourceHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceHandler
public class FileSystemResourceHandler
extends AbstractResourceHandler
implements ResourceHandler

Implementation of resourcehandler that gets its resources from the filesystem.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés

Constructor Detail

FileSystemResourceHandler

public FileSystemResourceHandler(java.lang.String baseDir,
                                 java.io.File tempDirRoot,
                                 java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
Createss a filesystem based handler.

Parameters:
baseDir - Directory where js files are located.
tempDirRoot - Directory to store temporary files
charset - Charset to use for reading/writing the files.
